These are the valid chemical entities identified in the paragraph. The entities are presented precisely as they appear in the original paragraph. IKr and IKs are types of ion channels, specifically potassium channels, and Ca (2+) refers to calcium ions. The "blockers" are substances that inhibit or prevent the function of these ion channels or calcium channels, respectively. Therefore, they are considered chemicals.
